topic.title: Good VPN
topic.body:
Hi everyone !
I just discovered an awesome free VPN which is in partly built for Chinese people (you know censorship and shit) and allows them to connect anywhere. As I know a lot of you guys are here, I was thinking I should share this VPN in case anybody find it useful :) And as I said it's free so you can give it a shot.
Here's the sauce : https://secure.link/IsZOY4L7
Hope you'll enjoy and that my help will be useful ^^

4_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body: Maybe the solution is them understanding they have their own forum ?

1_1BpNbHgqwXTmdgJar9TbkFpNrD43ztsKWy.body:
> [akito](#comment_109_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): Is there any "free" VPN without logging, etc.?

There is no logging, you don't have to put an email adress and you can pay with BTC. There is no more anonymous than that. Of course you need an account, but you don't have to give any personal infos. And that's what I like with this VPN

1_1P7ngox2iQVMeo7Tduop4SzDrHptzaSS6B.body: Just the idea of a free, non big company hosted and user powered is awesome to me, I don't need a specific case, just a free place as the internet should be.
